    • updateTeam

      public boolean updateTeam(int gameId, Team team, boolean homeTeam)
      If the game exists, and the team is not the same as the other team, then update the team
      Parameters:
      gameId - The id of the game you want to update
      team - The team to update
      homeTeam - boolean value that determines whether the team is the home team or the visitor team
      Returns:
      A boolean value.

    • updateLocation

      public boolean updateLocation(int gameId, String location)

      gameId - The id of the game you want to update

      A boolean value.

    • getScore

      public int[] getScore(Game game)
      "Get the score of a game." The function is named getScore, and it takes a Game object as a parameter. It returns an array of two integers, the first being the home team's score, and the second being the visitor team's score
      Parameters:
      game - The game object that is being played.
      Returns:
      An array of two integers.

    • getAllScores

      Returns:
      A list of int arrays.
